summary: Hip-Hop: Beyond Beats & Rhymes provides a riveting examination of manhood, sexism, and homophobia in hip-hop culture.
cast: Carmen Ashurst-Watson|Yasiin Bey|Chuck D|Jelani Cobb|Chuck Creekmur|De La Soul|Michael Eric Dyson|Beverly Guy-Sheftall|Stephen Hill|Byron Hurt|Jadakiss|Sut Jhally|Fat Joe|Sarah Jones|Jackson Katz|Talib Kweli|Mark Anthony Neal|Nelly|James Peterson|Kevin Powell|Busta Rhymes|Russell Simmons|Conrad Tillard|Emil Wilbekin
title: Hip-Hop: Beyond Beats & Rhymes
